findings.title: MEM - Misleading Error Messages
findings.description: The contract is using misleading error messages that do not accurately reflect the problem.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not adhere to the Solidity style guide, making it difficult for others to understand and work with.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: The contract is missing events that are necessary for logging information about changes or actions within the contract.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: The contract uses uninitialized local variables, which can lead to unpredictable behavior and errors.

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The contract does not check if the result of transfer methods is successful, which can lead to errors.
